1.4.name: wordpress/tweet-old-post
1.4.description:
Tweet Old Posts is a plugin designed to tweet your older posts to get more traffic.

This plugin helps you to keeps your old posts alive by tweeting about them and driving more traffic to them from twitter. It also helps you to promote your content. You can set time and no of tweets to post to drive more traffic.For questions, comments, or feature requests, contact me! Ajay Matharu you can follow me twitter at @matharuajay.

For updates follow http://twitter.com/matharuajay. If you have anything you can post your comment at Tweet Old Post Page.

Fortcoming

  • Sleep time
  • Additional text based on categories

Tweet Old Post provides following features

  • Share new and old posts.
